ProjectTitle: Comparing the knee joint loading profile of early post-traumatic and non-traumatic knee osteoarthritis: towards prevention of progression with more personalized rehabilitation.
InitialFeedbackHistory:
08/06/2022
Very good DMP, just one issue: 
3.2 Ethical and Legal: Medical research should be ethically evaluated by the Ethics committee research UZ/ KU Leuven, PRET is in this case only used for the registration of personal data processing. Please update your DMP to also include this approval number starting with an S, maybe this is S66034 which is now mentioned as project identifier? See also www.kuleuven.be/english/research/ethics/committees. Please submit your updated DMP as intermediate.
label: intermediate DMP needed
